body.name: Culinary Elements Microwavable Egg Muffin Pan with Lid: Non-stick & Microwave Safe, Perfect for Breakfast Sandwiches
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 27 mins
features: CONTENTS: Three (3) Microwavable Egg Muffin Pans. Holds one egg each.
MAIN USE: Make eggs in less than a minute. Break eggs into the egg muffin pan, close lid and microwave to cook.
PERFECT FOR: Making breakfast sandwiches in minutes. A quick and healthy breakfast before work or school.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Our reusable egg cooker is microwave safe and BPA free. Wash in hot, soapy water and air dry.
SPECIFICATIONS: Made of BPA free plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is fantastic for making breakfast sandwiches. I tried the Hamilton Beach sandwich maker, and this not only makes a better sandwich, cleans up better, and is faster (I'm making sandwiches for myself and kids every morning). It's also a great value compared to the HB sandwich maker. The only downside I have found is that the eggs will sometimes pop, causing the maker to jump, in the microwave. This isn't a problem, just wanted to warn people so they aren't caught off guard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use. Must put oil in first.
reviews.reviewText: Used for scrambled eggs with veggies and cheese. Single egg use a lot only takes 40 seconds on microwave. Must put oil, spray oil at least a little puddle. I use a spray olive oil. Durable, easy to clean. Lid closes good. I've put sausage pattie in to separately spray oil too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm.
reviews.reviewText: This made a perfect egg for an English muffin and was easy to clean. I scrambled the egg with a splash of milk right in the container before microwaving for one minute. I forgot to mix the bacon in so heated that separately the first day. This morning I will add precooked bacon for even greater simplicity. Received it less than 24 hours after ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Very handy to fix a breakfast sandwich. Easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little cookers!
reviews.reviewText: I've used one of these for years and LOVE it! Two of us now working from home, needed to get another one so we could make two eggs for muffins at the same time (luxury problems!) Price for 3 pack I couldn't pass up. Other reviews said there were no instructions on them, received today in complete packaging with instructions, pic included for your enjoyment. I have found cooking time varies by microwave wattage and personal preference for done-ness. One egg, with a TBS milk and 1/4 tsp butter for 1 min 20 sec in 950 wt microwave is perfect for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Time is on Your Side
reviews.reviewText: An Awesome Invention that allows for a healthy on-the-go breakfast when time is of the essence! Such an easy start-to-finish procedure with little cleanup. I highly recommend this time-saver that allows a quick & tasty breakfast for all those that fight the clock daily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast, Easy, and Healthy
reviews.reviewText: Love everything about this 3 pack Microwaveable Egg Muffin Breakfast Pan. Simple to use, and cleans easy. Just crack an egg, scramble it if you like inside the little pan, add some seasonings/toppings (oregano, bacon bits, etc.), and then close the lid and microwave for about 30-35 seconds (No need to add/coat with butter or any kind of oils). With a flexible rubber spatula, just scoop it right into/onto an English muffin, bagel, or in anything you want; the options are endless. This is great to have if you have a very busy lifestyle, and want something to eat that is super fast, easy, and healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are better than you think !!!
reviews.reviewText: I love poached eggs. But not during the week. Theses make great at home "Egg Mc Muffins." I give them to new parents - who need time savers while honing their parenting/couple skills. I also give them to bachelors and friends who are taking nutrition seriously. WARNING: Get TOASTING your muffins BEFORE you microwave FRESCH eggs (i.e. not a week old) !!! Because the eggs WILL be ready when the toast is done !!!. Then vary taste with different cheeses, seasonings or even jellies. Remember to spray with oil before cracking the egg. It will clean up easier AND the eggs will slide out. : ) I wanted THESE egg poachers because they are made with DURABLE hinges. Some microwave poachers hade plastic hinges will eventually wear out. These comments come from the "voice of Experience".
